message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I understand where you're coming from, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to meet you halfway just yet. I'm willing to compromise, though! I'll sell the product to you for $125.
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $115?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $128.
I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $118?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we won't reach an agreement, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $130.
I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $122?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'll make one more offer. I'll sell the product to you for $135.
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm still not comfortable with $135. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $129?
